text: Would like to thank the staff and driver for 27/10/2024 . I lost my cardholder during my bus ride in 124 and immediately called this terminal to contact the driver regarding it. less than 10 minutes i got a call back that the driver found my cardholder and made my way down to collect it. very efficient thank you so much to the indian lady driver who helped me !

Although its small nice and charming terminal, the efficiency and bus scheduling, are one of the most sub standard in singapore. Although the schedule shows a certain time of departure or arrival, the timing is always off, and it may even exceed 5 to 10 mintues. Not acceptable especially if we pride ourselves as one of the best public transport in the world.

The bus drivers in this interchange can sometime skip bus or come 5mins late. I hope SBS take note of this because this always happen and the bus app always put 3 mins despite waited for 5mins lol. To add on, just today , a 129 bus supposed to come 115pm but ended skipping and the next bus came at 130pm.
quite small, i don't see a lot of people boarding the buses here and no bus guides here. the security guard is also very unfriendly. only good thing is that it's located next to a hawker centre.
Nice n quiet place...small canteen with nice foods
